10  template< class XValueType, class XValueTypeSource >
11  class KSComponentMaximumAt :
12  public KSComponent
13  {
14  public:
15  KSComponentMaximumAt( KSComponent* aParentComponent, XValueType* aParentPointer, XValueTypeSource* aSourcePointer ) :
16  KSComponent(),
17  fMaximum( aSourcePointer ),
18  fOperand( aParentPointer ),
19  fMaximumAt( KSNumerical< XValueType >::Zero() )
20  {
21  Set( &fMaximumAt );
22  this->SetParent( aParentComponent );
23  aParentComponent->AddChild( this );
24  }
25  KSComponentMaximumAt( const KSComponentMaximumAt< XValueType, XValueTypeSource >& aCopy ) :
26  KSComponent( aCopy ),
27  fMaximum( aCopy.fMaximum ),
28  fOperand( aCopy.fOperand ),
29  fMaximumAt( aCopy.fMaximumAt )
30  {
31  Set( &fMaximumAt );
32  this->SetParent( aCopy.fParentComponent );
33  aCopy.fParentComponent->AddChild( this );
34  }
35  virtual ~KSComponentMaximumAt()
36  {
37  }

40  //KSComponent
41  //***********

43  public:
44  KSComponent* Clone() const
45  {
46  return new KSComponentMaximumAt< XValueType, XValueTypeSource >( *this );
47  }
48  KSComponent* Component( const std::string& aField )
49  {
50  objctmsg_debug( "component maximum_at <" << this->GetName() << "> building component named <" << aField << ">" << eom )
51  KSComponent* tComponent = KSDictionary< XValueType >::GetComponent( this, aField );
52  if( tComponent == NULL )
53  {
54  objctmsg( eError ) << "component maximum_at <" << this->GetName() << "> has no output named <" << aField << ">" << eom;
55  }
56  else
57  {
58  fChildComponents.push_back( tComponent );
59  }
60  return tComponent;
61  }
62  KSCommand* Command( const std::string& /*aField*/, KSComponent* /*aChild*/ )
63  {
64  return NULL;
65  }
66 
67  public:
68  void InitializeComponent()
69  {
70  fMaximum.Reset();
71  }
72 
73  void PushUpdateComponent()
74  {
75  objctmsg_debug( "component maximum_at <" << this->GetName() << "> pushing update" << eom );
76  if ( fMaximum.Update() == true )
77  {
78  fMaximumAt = (*fOperand);
79  }
80  }
81 
82  void PullDeupdateComponent()
83  {
84  objctmsg_debug( "component maximum_at <" << this->GetName() << "> pulling deupdate" << eom );
85  fMaximum.Reset();
86  }
87 
88  private:
89  KSComponentValueMaximum< XValueTypeSource > fMaximum;
90  XValueType* fOperand;
91  XValueType fMaximumAt;
92  };
